item.title: Change Logs
item.description: State Emergency Department template (state_ed_report) 11/16/2021 The State Emergency Department template has been updated. This version has: Modified algorithm for trajectory analysis to improve state and county-level trend classifications. Improved figure sizing to accommodate the selection of many categories. Improved time series visualizations, color palettes. Added interactive sparklines to DT table, Improve table formatting. 6/8/2021 State Emergency Department template available.
